ch.qos.logback.classic.spi
Class ThrowableProxyUtil

java.lang.Object
  ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.ThrowableProxyUtil

public class ThrowableProxyUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Convert a throwable into an array of ThrowableDataPoint objects.

Author:
Ceki Gülcü

Deprecated. Use subjoinSTEPArray(StringBuilder sb, int indentLevel, IThrowableProxy tp) instead.

subjoinSTEPArray

public static void subjoinSTEPArray(java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                                    int indentLevel,
                                    IThrowableProxy tp)
Parameters:
sb - The StringBuilder the STEPs are appended to.
indentLevel - indentation level used for the STEPs, usually either REGULAR_EXCEPTION_INDENT or SUPPRESSED_EXCEPTION_INDENT.
tp - the IThrowableProxy containing the STEPs.
